DescribeBillDetail.document: This example shows you how to get bill details.
DescribeBillDetail.input:
POST / HTTP/1.1
Host: billing.tencentcloudapi.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-TC-Action: DescribeBillDetail
<Common request parameters>

{
    "Offset": 0,
    "Limit": 1,
    "PeriodType": "byUsedTime",
    "Month": "2022-01",
    "BeginTime": "2022-01-01 00:00:00",
    "EndTime": "2022-01-02 00:00:00",
    "NeedRecordNum": 1,
    "ResourceId": "eip-ct36wgjp"
}

DescribeBillResourceSummary.document: This example shows you how to get a bill summary by instance.

    "Limit": 1,
